datasetParam.name: sample_id
datasetParam.help: Input a comma delimited set of Sample IDs, or upload a file. Wildcards (*) are allowed.

sqlQuery.name: MicrobiomeDatasets
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct dsp.name AS internal, dsp.name as term, display_name AS display from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dsp where dsp.name like 'otu_%_RSRC' order by display_name asc

sqlQuery.name: SamplesTaxon
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct pan_name as term, term_id as property, round(value,2) as value, taxon_level from apidbtuning.taxonabundance where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$) and lower(category) != 'species' -- and value is not null order by taxon_level

sqlQuery.name: SamplesTaxonSpec
sqlQuery.sql: select property, spec_property, spec_value as spec_value from ( select distinct property as property, spec_property, spec_value from apidbTuning.TaxonAbundanceSpec where property in ( select distinct term_id as property from apidbtuning.taxonabundance where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$) and lower(category) != 'species' union select distinct category as property from apidbtuning.taxonabundance where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$) and lower(category) != 'species' ) )

sqlQuery.name: SamplesWithMetadata
sqlQuery.sql: select * from ( select pan_name as term, pan_name as display, protocol_app_node_id as internal from apidbTuning.panCharacteristicMetadata where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$) and pan_name not like '[alpha_diversity]' union select pan_name as term, pan_name as display, protocol_app_node_id as internal from apidbTuning.panProtocolMetadata where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$) union select pan_name as term, pan_name as display, protocol_app_node_id as internal from apidbTuning.FallbackMetadata where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$)) where term not like '%[alpha_diversity]%'

sqlQuery.name: SamplesMetadata
sqlQuery.sql: select * from ( select pan_name as term, term as property, value from apidbTuning.panCharacteristicMetadata where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$) union select pan_name as term, term as property, value from apidbTuning.panProtocolMetadata where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$) union select pan_name as term, term_name as property, value from apidbTuning.fallbackmetadata where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$) ) where property in ( select distinct property from apidbTuning.MetadataSpec where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$) and spec_property = 'parent' )

sqlQuery.name: MetadataSpec
sqlQuery.sql: select property, spec_property, decode(spec_value,'Thing',null,spec_value) as spec_value from ( select distinct property, spec_property, spec_value from apidbTuning.MetadataSpec where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$)) where property in ( select distinct property from apidbTuning.MetadataSpec where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$) and spec_property = 'parent' )
